meanings.definition: A large natural elevation of the earth's surface rising abruptly from the surrounding level; a large steep hill.
meanings.sent1: The mountain stood tall against the sky.
meanings.sent2: We hiked up the mountain to enjoy the view.
meanings.sent3: The mountain seemed to challenge us to climb it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as high and majestic as a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The mountain's shadow stretched far across the valley.

meanings.sent1: He had a mountain of laundry to fold.
meanings.sent2: The toys formed a mountain in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The mountain of dishes in the sink seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent4: The paperwork on his desk resembled a mountain of tasks.
meanings.sent5: The mountain of presents under the tree delighted the children.
